column3: @gapeman Welcome!\nScreenshots "before" and "after" are appreciated in the PR description.
Concept NACK because I think that the current icon does this job. Also we are using icons from [here](https://www.s-ings.com/typicons/) and I think its better to keep using these icons

Looks not to bad. Either we use an icon from https://www.s-ings.com/typicons/ or you would need to put an entry into `doc/assets-attribution.md` (creator, license, etc.).\n\nHowever, I think your new icon would require padding to not appear overly large.

I have padded the icon, and updated the copyright file. I've also noticed some mistakes in the copyright file (It's Stephen, not Stephan).
Current licence file is under /contrib/debian/copyright and I'm not sure why - surely it would be better for it to stay in doc/assets-attribution.md?

p.s. Updated copyright 2 times because I accidentally removed "< >" symbols
c95ad1d looks good, but please squash the commits\n\nWould also be good to add a screenshot of the icon in context.
Closing this pull request, opening new one
In future please just squash and force push to the branch, rather than opening a new PR.
